name: Ichor-Covered Platemail
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (excellent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration impressively.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
Goblin Platemail can encompass the wearer's enemies in slime on
a successful hit.  This slime can cause a great deal of damage
